title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 503.11 - Maintenance of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 503.11 - Maintenance of records

State Regulations

All records related to these service standards shall be
available for inspection by staff of the department at an office of the water
corporation in the county in which the waterworks is located. In addition, these records shall be kept on file for a period of six
years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
503.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
